remarks: An isomorphism in the category of unital rings is a bijection. (Contributed by AV, 14-Feb-2020.)
statement:
ringcsect.c $e |- C = ( RingCat ` U ) $.
ringcsect.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
ringcsect.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
ringcsect.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
ringcsect.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
ringciso.n $e |- I = ( Iso ` C ) $.
ringciso $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. ( X I Y ) <-> F e. ( X RingIso Y ) ) ) $.
